document.full_text: tampa bay buccaneers cb aqib talib was released on a $25,000 bond on wednesday after surrendering to police in texas.
document.title: bucs' aqib talib surrenders, freed on $25,000 bond in shooting charge
lines_and_colors: tampa bay buccaneers cb aqib talib was released on a $25,000 bond on wednesday after surrendering to police in texas.
